definitions: carried slowly by a current of air or water

examples.text: behind them rose the broken highlands crowned with drifting clouds

shortDefinitions: carried slowly by current of air or water

examples.text: the drifting economy spells more trouble for the government's balance sheet

definitions: continually moving from place to place, without any fixed home or job

examples.text: a play about a drifting teenager in Dublin

shortDefinitions: continually moving from place to place

definitions: (especially of snow or leaves) blown into heaps by the wind
shortDefinitions: (of snow) blown into heaps by wind
